Drive-Thru Check-In Resort
The Park Drive-Thru Check-In Resort, Thailand
The Park Resort Now Open! The Park Drive-Thru Check-in Resort
The first Drive-Thru Check-In resort in the world 4/25/11
The Park Resort Customer reviews Here. Imagine! Getting a hotel room as easy as pulling up to the drive-thru of your favorite fast food restaurant. It can be that easy. The Park Resort is exactly that. The first drive-thru check-in resort in the world. Without ever leaving your car, the entire check-in process, room selection and payment is completed in one simple step. Just drive up to your cottage with private parking and the room is yours to enjoy. There is also no check-out procedure because all details are taken care of once you have checked-in. Customer A: I love this place! Customer B: The Rooms are fantastic Customer C: The room have different styles. Five Stars!!!!!!! Posted by THE PARK Drive-Thru Check-In Resort at 5:11 AM No comments:
